meanings.definition: Fat located on the back of an animal.
meanings.sent1: The pig had a thick layer of backfat.
meanings.sent2: The butcher trimmed the backfat off the pork belly.
meanings.sent3: The backfat on the cow made it look like it was wearing a fluffy coat.
meanings.sent4: The backfat of the whale was as vast as the ocean it swam in.
meanings.sent5: The backfat jiggled as the pig trotted around the pen.

meanings.definition: Fat located on the back of a person.
meanings.sent1: The doctor advised the patient to reduce their backfat for better health.
meanings.sent2: She felt self-conscious about the backfat bulging over her jeans.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his backfat was his 'winter insulation'.
meanings.sent4: Her backfat seemed to weigh her down like a heavy burden.
meanings.sent5: The backfat dimpled when she leaned back against the chair.
